title: 永恆唯一的盼望
author: 曾祥怡 Grace Tseng
book: 敬拜讚美專輯 (19) 這裡有榮耀
lyrics_raw:
<1>
有一位真神 祂名字叫耶穌 
祂來到這世界上 為要救贖你 
生命的意義 盡在這福音裡 
只要你開口呼喊 耶穌
</1>
<chorus>
耶穌是生命 一切問題的解答 
耶穌是生命 一切黑暗的亮光 
將憂傷變為喜樂 將懼怕變為力量 
耶穌是永恆唯一的盼望
</chorus>

content.origin:
有一位真神 祂名字叫耶穌 
祂來到這世界上 為要救贖你 
生命的意義 盡在這福音裡 
只要你開口呼喊 耶穌

title: Emmanuel
author: Bob McGee
lyrics_raw:
<1>
[C]E[C/E]mmanuel[F],
[Dm]E[G7]mmanuel[Em7]
[Am]His name[C/C#] is [Dm7]called
[G]""Emmanuel"" [C2][C]
[C/E]God with us[F][C/E]
[Dm7]Re[G]vealed in [Em7]us[Am]
His [A/C#]name is [Em7]called [G]""Emmanuel""[C]
[Region 2]
以馬內利，以馬內利，祂名稱做以馬內利；
上帝同在，彰顯榮光，祂名稱做以馬內利。</1>

title: 祂必興旺  我必衰微
author: papachen
book: 2024年北卡台福教會敬拜退休會主題曲
lyrics_raw:
<1>
何等榮耀 何等的恩典
在祢寶座前 洗淨我汙穢
我呼求祢 謙卑跪下向祢敬拜
祢是我磐石 祢是我拯救　
祢是我主
You are my Lord
[region 2]
How glorious, what amazing grace
In front of Your throne, clean my sins away
I call out to You, humbly kneel and worship You
You are my rock, You are my savior
</1>
<2>
何等榮耀 何等的恩典
在祢寶座前 洗淨我汙穢
高舉雙手 我渴望見祢容顏
讓我能看見 讓我能聽見
聖靈請祢來 充滿我們中間
Holy Spirit please come, come and fill this place
[region 2]
How glorious, what amazing grace
In front of Your throne, clean my sins away
I lift my hands, how I long to see your face
Open my eyes Lord, open my ears
</2>
<chorus>
祂必興旺  我必衰微
主我願意  降服在祢面前
不看見自己  只求祢心意
願萬民悔改歸向祢
祂必興旺  我必衰微
讓我享受  祢愛的完全
喔  我一生只求能藏在祢裡面
單單瞻仰祢的面 我的喜樂就完全
[region 2]
He must increase, I must decrease
Lord I submit, myself before You
It's no longer I, but Christ who lives in me
May every nation turn to You
He must increase, I must decrease
Let me rejoice, in Your endless love Lord
All I need Lord, is to hide in Your shadow
Just one glimpse of Your face, all of my joy is fulfilled
</chorus>
<bridge>
我要為祢預備道路
填平一切高山低谷
彎曲黑暗的心靈
憂傷痛苦的生命
凡有氣息的都要
經歷救恩  罪得赦免
[region 2]
I'll prepare the path for You
Level every valley every hill
Every lost and twisted heart, Lord
Every sad and hopeless life, Lord
Let everything that has breath
See salvation, be forgiven</bridge>

May every nation turn to You
He must increase, I must decrease
Let me rejoice, in Your endless love Lord
All I need Lord, is to hide in Your shadow
Just one glimpse of Your face, all of my joy is fulfilled

content.name: b
content.origin:
我要為祢預備道路
填平一切高山低谷
彎曲黑暗的心靈
憂傷痛苦的生命
凡有氣息的都要
經歷救恩  罪得赦免
[region 2]
I'll prepare the path for You
Level every valley every hill
Every lost and twisted heart, Lord
Every sad and hopeless life, Lord
Let everything that has breath
See salvation, be forgiven

content.origin:
何等榮耀 何等的恩典
在祢寶座前 洗淨我汙穢
我呼求祢 謙卑跪下向祢敬拜
祢是我磐石 祢是我拯救　
祢是我主
You are my Lord
[region 2]
How glorious, what amazing grace
In front of Your throne, clean my sins away
I call out to You, humbly kneel and worship You
You are my rock, You are my savior

content.origin:
何等榮耀 何等的恩典
在祢寶座前 洗淨我汙穢
高舉雙手 我渴望見祢容顏
讓我能看見 讓我能聽見
聖靈請祢來 充滿我們中間
Holy Spirit please come, come and fill this place
[region 2]
How glorious, what amazing grace
In front of Your throne, clean my sins away
I lift my hands, how I long to see your face
Open my eyes Lord, open my ears

content.name: c
content.origin:
祂必興旺  我必衰微
主我願意  降服在祢面前
不看見自己  只求祢心意
願萬民悔改歸向祢
祂必興旺  我必衰微
讓我享受  祢愛的完全
喔  我一生只求能藏在祢裡面
單單瞻仰祢的面 我的喜樂就完全
[region 2]
He must increase, I must decrease
Lord I submit, myself before You
It's no longer I, but Christ who lives in me

He must increase, I must decrease
Let me rejoice, in Your endless love Lord
All I need Lord, is to hide in Your shadow
Just one glimpse of Your face, all of my joy is fulfilled
